events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to an incorrect item delivery.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Let me help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and the order number so I can verify your request?
Here is the photo of the wrong product that arrived along with my order number 12345XYZ as requested.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
That sounds good, thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate the prepaid label for the return.
We have processed your refund and sent the return shipping label to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We just wanted to follow up to ensure you received your refund and the return process was smooth.
Thanks for confirming that everything is settled. We are closing this case now, and please don’t hesitate to contact us again anytime.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email; your feedback helps us improve our service.
